Name: Lithuanian Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: MUDDLE lemongrass, lime juice and sugar in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with 50/50 mix of cubed and crushed ice. Fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Originally based on Bacardi Carta Blanca, this was the Lithuanian Bacardí Legacy 2013 winning cocktail . It was created by Robertas Janovskis at Sweet and Sour in Vilnius, Lithuania.
